scripts.dev: tsc -b && vite build --watch && cpx manifest.json dist && cpx "icons/**/*" dist/icons && cpx "src/popup/index.html" dist/popup && cpx "src/history/index.html" dist/history
scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && cpx manifest.json dist && cpx "icons/**/*" dist/icons && cpx "src/popup/index.html" dist/popup && cpx "src/history/index.html" dist/history
